publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2048 Patricia Ferguson: John Paul Academy’s Campus Policeman, Peter Glancey—That the Parliament applauds the actions of Constable Peter Glancey, Campus Officer at Glasgow’s John Paul Academy, for his action in dealing with teenagers who admitted acts of vandalism at a new play park in the Summerston area and for trying to instil in those responsible a sense of community spirit by ensuring that they were required to clean up the damage they caused; hopes that such quick intervention will have the desired effect, and further hopes and that in future the play park can be safely used by the children of the area.
